archimate:Device.name: High-Performance Diagnostic AIO Desktop (HPD)
archimate:Device.documentation:
Intended Use:
• Radiology department, laboratory analysis, diagnostic imaging reviews (PACS/RIS), Health Records, and Quality Management • High-resolution imaging, detailed clinical analysis, complex data visualization.
Specifications:
• Processor type: Intel Core i7/i9 or AMD Ryzen 7/9 • Memory capacity: 64 GB RAM • Storage options: 1–2 TB NVMe SSD (high-speed storage) • Graphics capability: Dedicated GPU (NVIDIA RTX series or AMD equivalent) at least 8gb memory • Expansion slots and ports: USB-A (x4+), USB-C/Thunderbolt (x2), HDMI 2.1 output, DisplayPort, Ethernet (2.5Gbps ), SD card reader, audio I/O • Form factor: Large, stable professional build, 27–32 inches • Power supply rating: Integrated PSU, 500W+ (high efficiency, stable power delivery). • Cooling system: Advanced active cooling, silent cooling technology • Operating system compatibility: Windows 11 Pro, certified for medical diagnostic imaging • Monitor specs: 32 inches, 4K UHD (3840x2160), IPS, DICOM compliant, high color accuracy, touch screen, anti-reflective coating • Protective Equipment: Anti-glare and damage-resistant screen protector, reinforced secure mounts, cable management solutions • Included peripherals: Mouse and Keyboard
• Security Features:
o RFID or biometric authentication for secure login/logout o Privacy screen filter integrated or attached o TPM 2.0 security module for encryption of patient data o Compliant with HIPAA and relevant data security standards.
